__e: Well, Watson, what do you make of it?
Holmes? As I was telling Watson, something happened last night, which may throw some light on this matter.
No. But, I expect one day Dr Watson will.
Dr. Watson and I are going across the way to take a look at the scene of the crime.
Well, if you've had enough to eat Watson... and are feeling of better spirits I think we better be getting along.
I commend your clarity of mind, Watson. What thing is that?
The launch is waiting to take Dr. Watson ashore, sir.
In a case like this naturally everyone is suspected.
If you missed my earlier blog post, you can find out more about the Watson Build here and on PartnerWorld.
Two weeks left for Watson Build business plan submissions
What advice would you give to other Business Partners that might be debating whether to join the Watson Build program this year?
